Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays leaving O'Hare.
Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays leaving O'Hare.

Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Arthington
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Van Buren, California, Roosevelt, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/Arthington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Van Buren, California, Roosevelt, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/Arthington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following police activity at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following police activity at Fullerton. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
